metadata.title: CVE-2022-48632 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:i2c: mlxbf: prevent stack overflow in mlxbf_i2c_smbus_start_transaction()memcpy() is called in a loop while 'operation->length' upper boundis not checked and 'data_idx' also increments.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
